about_the_game:
To Hell and Back

“They will wage war against the Lamb, but the Lamb will triumph over them.” - Revelation 17:14



666 takes classic FPS gameplay and beefs it up with modern graphics.

  • Boomer Shooter meets Horror genre
  • Blast your way through 3 episodes of single-player levels crafted to test even the boldest players.
  • Deep weapon loadout with fluid animations
  • High enemy variety, awesome enemy designs
  • Modern graphics on Unreal Engine 5

Arsenal at Your Disposal

"For every beast of the forest is mine, and the cattle upon a thousand hills." - Psalm 50:10

  • Kukri🔪: Your trusty blade for close combats; be it slashing or piercing.
  • Pistol🔫: Essential shooter's sidearm, ready to light up the shadows.
  • Boomstick🔥: Close-range powerhouse, echoing the classics.
  • Double Barrel Shotty🌪️: Dual buckshot bursts sending demons back to their fiery pits.
  • Grenade💥: Crowd-controller at its finest. Toss, retreat, and revel in the chaos.
  • Chainsaw⛓️: The answer for those craving direct, gruesome confrontations.
  • AK-47🔥: Rapidity meets precision, the iconic barrage-maker.
  • Minigun💣: A whirlwind of lead, decimating anything in its path.
  • Rocket Launcher🚀: For those challenging opponents; launch and let havoc ensue.
  • Flammenwerfer🔥: Turn foes into a crispy demon feast.
  • .50 Pistol💥: The chrome titan, a beastly statement of power.
  • SMG🌪️: Unleash a bullet-storm, delivering rapid retribution.
  • Molotov Cocktail🔥: A bottle of fiery wrath, setting the world ablaze.

*Is there a weapon you want in the game? Comment with your suggestions!

Chainsaw

Your tool for direct, gruesome confrontations.

Kukri

Your trusty blade for close combats; be it slashing or piercing.

Pistol

Swiftly drawn, this sidearm illuminates shadows with precision (weapon light not shown).

SMG

Viper-quick and venomous, its barrage challenges even the steadiest hand.

Boomstick

Unleash close-quarter carnage.

Double Barrel Shotty

Its twin blasts send demons reeling. Patience required for the reload.

.50 Pistol

Lightning in a bottle. Intense recoil that requires a pause between volleys.

AK-47

Swift to ready, its shots rain precise fury. Pick from single, burst, and auto.

Minigun

Unleashes a storm of bullets that will quickly overwhelm any enemy.

Rocket Launcher

Sometimes you just need a rocket launcher. Let pandemonium reign.

Flammenwerfer

It werfs flammen. Turn your enemies into a crispy demon barbecue.

Molotov Cocktail

Grip and hurl to light the world on fire.

Grenade

The ultimate in crowd-control. Toss, retreat, and watch the spectacle.

Embark on a Three-Episode Odyssey


Dive into a harrowing journey that will test your mettle and sanity. Each episode has a unique setting, rife with its own challenges, enemies, and dark secrets waiting to be uncovered. Explore dangerous environments, face off against formidable foes, and discover the mysteries hidden in the shadows.

  • Black Ops Government Site⛺
  • Underground Lab🔬🧟
  • Hell️🔥

Black Ops Government Site

Penetrate the guarded military facility where you once worked.


Underground Lab

Dive into the eerie depths, where nightmares await.



Journey to Hell️

Descend into inferno, confronting ultimate wickedness.



Meet Your Nightmares

“And I saw a beast coming out of the sea...” - Revelation 13:1

Confront these adversaries, adapt, and overcome. Every bullet, every slash, every explosion counts. The path to redemption is paved with the bodies of your foes.

Crawler

Shambling horrors from the grave, their insatiable hunger drives them forward.

Demon Rifleman

Infernal marksman, with each shot echoing the torments of the damned (rifle not shown).

Goblin Pack

Swarms of frenzied mischief-makers, reveling in the chaos they unleash.

Hellhound

Infernal beasts hunting in packs, their growls echo in the corridors.

Tortured Soul

Once human, now a floating wisp seeking to drain the life from anything it touches.

Cold-Eyed Slayer

Advances with silent confidence, eyes always watching. From afar, swords fly; up close, a gladius strikes

Distracted Deadwalker

Ambles aimlessly, sometimes lost in its own world. Becomes alert unpredictably with a bite ready, but falls as easily as it awakens.

Blast Ghoul

Charges with manic intensity, its presence heralded by an ominous ticking. An explosive demise awaits all in its path, friend or foe.

Zombie Marauder

A menacing presence among the undead, its grunts chillingly human. Upon spotting prey, it lunges with fervor, unleashing a flurry of brutal strikes.

Bile Brute

A hulking monstrosity that lumbers forth. While slow, its strikes are forceful, and its corrosive blood-bile attack makes it a deadly adversary.

Boneblade Duelist

The sudden sound of its sword being drawn is the only warning of its imminent and deadly bone slash combo. One misstep, and you'll be greeted with a shattering display of bone.


Eldritch Marksman
A tactical demon sharpshooter, fluent in eerie man-demon mutterings. His charged volleys and strategic moves highlight his lethal intelligence.

Abyssal Brute

Towering titans with a hide toughened by the fires of hell, they deal as much damage as they can absorb.

Demonic Sorcerer

Masters of dark arts, they prefer to attack from a distance, summoning hellfire and cursing the very ground you stand on.

Infernal Centurion

Armored warriors from ancient times, now serving hell’s legions, wielding weapons engulfed in flames.

Screaming Banshee

With a voice that can shatter glass and eardrums, these tormented spirits can incapacitate you with their piercing shrieks.

Netherworld Serpent

Giant snakes that slither through the grounds of hell, seeking to constrict and devour their prey whole.

Final Guardian

Hell's last line of defense before facing its ruler, an amalgamation of the most fearsome creatures.

Features

  • Classic FPS gameplay, reimagined.
  • Bone-chilling horror ambiance.
  • A plethora of foes.
  • Fresh content through regular updates.

Wishlist the Game

Brace yourself for 666. It's a kill or be killed world. Find the wishlist button and press it now.

Disclaimer: Contains explicit violence, gore, and horror. Suitable for mature players only.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel or AMD
  • Memory: 8000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia or AMD
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5000 MB available space

short_description: Old-skool FPS gameplay with modern graphics and extra horror 😱 Chainsaw 🪚 Double Barrel Shotty 🛢️🛢️ Flamethrower 🔥 Evil magic powers 😈 Slay your way through three episodes: A blackops gov site on the surface ⛺ An underground lab ‍🔬🧟, and finally.. You're going straight to hell. Wishlist 666.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
